basics.name: Bram Kok
basics.label: Frontend developer
basics.summary: I'm a frontend developer with 10+ years experience in developing and designing web-based products and applications.

work.summary: iBOOD is Europe's first and largest day-to-date site. For ten years, iBOOD has offered a brand new A-brand brand at the very best internet price.
highlights: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), React, Next.js
Modernized the frontend web stack from PHP/jQuery to React/Next.js.
Developed a high traffic page with dynamic viewing capabilities in React.
Learned how to do agile development properly within a large team of developers.

work.summary: A year of personal sabbaticle after working for ten years.
highlights: Photography: developed a clear style and aesthetic by doing photography on a full-time basis.
Technology: broadening of skills in React, Node.js, Python, Bash, Docker.

work.summary: Simple Check offers businesses a medical check-up to prevent disease and absenteeism. With a mixture of positivity and new technology they offer employees ways to improve their health.
highlights: Technical skills: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), AngularJS, D3, Node.js
Developed the front-end product consisting out of a 'Health Dashboard' for customers to gain insights in their health.
Managed a group of outsourced developers working the backend product.
Developed marketing, brand, content and sales strategy

work.summary: Team Loyalty turns happy customers into loyal customers. They apply a method called ‘event matching’ that improves customer relationships by investing in professional and personal interests of the customer.
highlights: Technical skills: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), D3, Node.js
Developed the front-end product for a SaaS solution that offered customer deep insights into their customer relationships.
Managed a group of outsourced developers working the backend product.
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores
